requirements.plaintext: Complete Ritou Escape Plan Complete Washizu's Prayers

substeps.plaintext: Washizu will drop the Incomplete Notes and Tattered Paper quest items
substeps.markdown: ◀Washizu▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Washizu▷ will drop the ◀Incomplete Notes▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Incomplete_Notes▷ and ◀Tattered Paper▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Tattered_Paper_(Washizu)▷ quest items

steps.plaintext: Find Washizu's lost possessions in Higi Village

substeps.plaintext: The chest containing his possessions is buried between two unlit torches, in the backyard formed by the cliff and the two houses northwest of Higi Village's central tree.
substeps.markdown: The chest containing his possessions is buried between two unlit torches, in the backyard formed by the cliff and the two houses northwest of Higi Village's central tree.

substeps.plaintext: The Incomplete Register can also be found in the same backyard opposite his possessions, on the wooden "porch" sticking into the backyard from the nearest house.
substeps.markdown: The Incomplete Register can also be found in the same backyard opposite his possessions, on the wooden "porch" sticking into the backyard from the nearest house.
